SummaryEnglish: Mutsumi Gorou is one unlucky young man. When he was a little kid, each of his pets died from different tragic causes. Even until now, he can't seem to find the right job. The only job he had was one with a company which eventually went out of business. One day, a mysterious fortune teller called him and told him that he is definitely surrounded by bad luck. The fortune teller then gave him a cell phone, and then said that perhaps Mutsumi's luck will improve. The magical cell phone awakens all of his pets that he owned when he was a little kid, one by one, in the form of beautiful young girls.

1.SummaryEnglish:
The angels got to live with their master once again along with other four angels, Momo, Yuki, Midori, and Lulu.

They all started cleaning and redecorating the apartment while their master was away at a part-time job.

The girls decide to pick up Gorō after his part-time job. When he sees the girls, he notices that they are dirty and decides to take them all to a bathhouse to wash up.

Gorō Mutsumi, a man plagued by bad luck. One fateful day he crosses paths with a fortune teller who tells him his luck will soon change. Soon after 3 Guardian Angels appear,  Ran, Tsubasa, and Kurumi. It's soon discovered that Gorō knows these women from their past lives as various animals he has helped. They have been reincarnated by the Goddess to help and watch over him

2.TitleEnglish: I'm Not Afraid Of My Trauma
2.SummaryEnglish: Concerned that Ran, Tsubasa, and Kurumi have been unable to help Gorō  the Goddess decides to send another Guardian Angel to help him, Tamami. She arrives in the nick of time to save him from getting hit by a truck. Learning that she was a cat he had saved 10 years ago he takes her home. However the other Guardian Angels aren't too keen on this new addition.

3.SummaryEnglish: 2 new Guardian Angels appear:  Mika the rabbit and Nana the dog. The Goddess has sent them along with a clock so that they can more easily split time with Gorō instead of fighting amongst themselves for his attention. However the new timeshare system hits several snags.  In addition the mysterious man who tried to run over Gorō with the truck reappears, putting Gorō in a dangerous position atop of Ferris Wheel. With Tsubasa, who's terrified of heights, as the only one who can save him.

4.SummaryEnglish: Gorō has caught a cold. As the Guardian Angels fight amongst themselves 2 new Guardian Angels appear. Nana the turtle, and Akane the fox. The two have a new message from the Goddess as well. Exasperated by their lack of care with Gorō any Guardian Angel who aren't taking care of Gorō must turn into a doll. Hijinks ensure however when Gorō's phone, which is how the Guardian Angels are summoned, begins to ring again. The Guardian Angels disappear and Gorō wakes up to an empty house and a broken phone.

5.SummaryEnglish:
The Guardian Angels awaken back in the spirit world. They find themselves in the presence of the Goddess. Who tells them that they have failed in their duties as Guardian Angels because they couldn't work together. They realize their error and beg the Goddess to send them back. The Goddess tells them that she can't. But tells them there is another way. There are 4 Guardian Angels who have yet to awaken because Gorō doesn't remember them. The 8 Guardian Angel's pray and Gorō begins to recall the other 4.  Yuki the snake, Midori the raccoon, Momo the squirrel monkey, and Lulu the frog. 

The 12 of them leave with the Goddess' blessing. Gorō finds his phone restored and the 12 appear before him. They are all reunited again.

6.TitleEnglish: The Master Of The Soba Restaurant
6.SummaryEnglish:
Akane and Midori are sent to the store to get some noodles, They argue over the type of noodles to get. They eventually compromise and get spaghetti. On the way home Akane confesses that she distrusts humans. During their walk they see a shop called "Fox and Raccoon Mixed Noodles". Fearing that they are serving Fox and Raccoon meat the two barge in and beg the customers not to eat.

The owners take it in good humor and give the two a bowl of noodles to eat.  They learn the old woman used to a Guardian Angel as well.

7.TitleEnglish: The Elementary School For Small Angels
7.SummaryEnglish: Nana, Lulu, and Momo see kids playing at school and decide they want to join. They are bullied by three boys. Despite that, the trio beg the others to attend.  The other Guardian Angels decide to teach the girls at home however the three boys continue to find and bully them.

9.TitleEnglish: Feelings that have started to sprout

10.TitleEnglish: I will protect you even if it means sacrificing myself!

12.TitleEnglish: Special: The Story Of A Fairy Tale
12.SummaryEnglish: This special is a compilation video of the whole season in which each girl has a her own individual song sung by her respective voice actress. It highlights her story and there is a karaoke text frame on the bottom for the watcher to sing-a-long.
